titles: The Rump ululant, or Penitence per force; being The recantation of the old rust-roguy-rebellious-rampant, and now ruinous rotten-rosted Rump. To the tune of Gerrards mistresse.
notes: Verse - "Farewell false honours, and usurped power farewell,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early English books).
